meanings.definition: A type of worm that has a flat body and no skeleton.
meanings.sent1: Flatworms can be found in ponds and streams.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study flatworms to learn more about their unique anatomy.
meanings.sent3: The flatworms in the science experiment decided to have a race.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of knowledge, flatworms are the flat, wriggling pages of information.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the colorful flatworms they saw while snorkeling.
